message.name: ERR_ACTIVITYRECURRENCE_NO_OCCURRENCES
message.locale: There will be no occurrences of this recurring activity.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITYRECURRENCE_XVF_RECURRENCE_END_DATE
message.locale: The activity recurrence end date cannot be before the activity end date.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_XFV_NO_ORIGINATOR
message.locale: You must specify either a user or an organisation unit.
You must specify either a user or an organization unit.

message.name: ERR_INVITATIONSTATUS_NO_CHANGE
message.locale: The status of the invitation has not changed.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_FV_NUMBER_OF_OCCURRENCES
message.locale: The maximum number of occurrences allowed is %2s.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_FV_RECURRENCE_END_DATE
message.locale: The recurring activity cannot be created because there are %1s occurrences, when only %2s are allowed for any recurring activity.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_XRV_ALREADY_CANCELLED
message.locale: The activity has already been canceled.
The activity has already been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_XRV_CANCELLED
message.locale: You cannot modify this activity record as it has been canceled.
You cannot modify this activity record as it has been cancelled.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_XRV_CONFLICTS_FOUND
message.locale: The following conflicts have occurred: %1s

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_XRV_ALREADY_INVITED
message.locale: %1s has already been invited.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_FV_SELECT_ATTENDEE
message.locale: You must select an Attendee.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_REMOVE_USER
message.locale: Attendee cannot be removed as he/she is the activity owner.

message.name: INF_ACTIVITYATTENDEE_ACCEPTED
message.locale: %1s has accepted the invitation.

message.name: INF_ACTIVITYATTENDEE_PROVISIONAL
message.locale: %1s has provisionally accepted the invitation.

message.name: INF_ACTIVITYATTENDEE_REJECTED
message.locale: %1s has declined the invitation.

message.name: INF_ENDS
message.locale: ends

message.name: INF_AFTER
message.locale: after

message.name: INF_OCCURRENCES
message.locale: occurrence(s)

message.name: INF_CANCELLED
message.locale: Canceled
Cancelled

message.name: INF_MODIFIED
message.locale: Modified

message.name: INF_INVITATION
message.locale: Invitation

message.name: INF_WHEN
message.locale: When

message.name: INF_ACTIVITY_INVITE
message.locale: You have been invited to activity:

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITYRECURRENCE_NEGATIVE_OCCURRENCES
message.locale: The number of occurrences must be greater than zero.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_INVITE
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be invited to an activity.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_XRV_DUPLICATE_CLIENT_INVOLVEMENT
message.locale: A client that is currently marked as a duplicate cannot be involved in an activity.

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_XRV_INVITEUSERATTENDEE_ACCEPTANCE
message.locale: The following conflicts exist: %1s. \nAre you sure you want to accept this invitation?

message.name: ERR_ACTIVITY_XRV_INVITEATTENDEE
message.locale: Are you sure you want to accept this invitation?
